Allow me to explain the mission list notations.<Prompt>
Selecting  View mission list  will display a list of mission titles.<Prompt>
Once a mission has been selected, you will see the following notations under the mission title:  Objective  and  Recruitment. <Prompt>
Objective  refers to the condition that must be fulfilled in order for the mission to succeed.<Prompt>
After completing a mission objective, a  Rune of Release  will appear within the area. Activating the Rune of Release will signify the successful completion of the mission.<Prompt>

Recruitment  refers to the level and number of mercenaries being recruited for the mission. The level displayed is a suggestion only, and any mission can be undertaken by a mercenary of level 50 or above.<Prompt>
However, signing up for a mission of a level lower than your own will earn less Assault points from the Empire.<Prompt>
The number range displayed represents the minimum and maximum number of mercenaries allowed for the mission.<Prompt>
You must meet the minimum number requirement in order to begin an Assault mission.<Prompt>
This concludes the explanation of mission list notations.<Prompt>
